sql.where:
u.company_status <> '0'
and (u.company_name LIKE CONCAT(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR u.company_principal LIKE CONCAT(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
